Maple Stirfry Sauce

Notes

When mixing it never seems like it’s going to be enough, but when paired with a dish built on 1/2 cup of rice, it always seems to do the trick.

What's in it
  • 2 tbsps maple syrup
  • 2 tbsps soy sauce
  • 2 tbsps broth/water
  • 1/2 tsp cayenne
  • 1/2 tsp cornstarch
What to do
  • Whisk together until nice and mixed
